title: Downtown Lima Historic Guided City Tour
provider:
Nico via what’s app was perfect! I highly recommend it!
  • Fasil C
    Written January 12, 2023
    This tour was absolutely amazing! This is in large part due to Nico the tour guide. I had a million questions and Nico was very knowledgable and friendly throughout the tour. We started the tour in a nice, clean and air conditioned vehicle that was driven by an excellent driver; Oscar. We started the tour to the temple of Pachamac were we saw Alpacas (not always guaranteed!) and were able to learn a lot about Peru's pre-colonial history and culture. Nico cares a lot about his profession and is extremely knowledgeable of all the sites we visited. Then, we stopped at a nice spot in Barranco for a meal. Nico gave us excellent reccomendations and we loved our meals. We also saw a lot of Barranco's culture through historic landmarks and art; something we passed by all the time and had no idea of the importance until our knowledgeable guide explained this to us. Afterwards, we went to the old city center to visit the catacombs and were able to get a very nice tour of the catacombs which were rich with history. Finally, finishing off the tour we got to see the water-circuit tour in Miraflores. This was well worth the money and with Nico as your guide youre in the best hands. This tour and in particular in Nico made our trip to Peru that much better. Would highly recommend 11/10!
  • Liz
    Written November 2, 2022
    It ended up only be two of us - benefits of a private tour having the guide all to ourselves. Would definitely book and recommend this tour. Thanks Geiner.

          Itinerary

reviews.title: Lima downtown city tour
reviews.text: This was a very good tour, our guide was very knowledgeable and she shared a lot of information about each stop and answered questions. There were a few other things that might have been nice to see but overall well planned and enjoyable tour

reviews.title: English city tour booked but not received. Refund was refused.
reviews.text: I had booked an English city tour. For three people. When we got on the bus, it soon became clear that the tour was in Spanish. We asked for it. But unfortunately no English-speaking guide was provided. So the three of us didn't understand anything about the city tour. And with that we had spent our money for nothing. The money was not refunded to us. Therefore, in our opinion, this guided city tour is not recommended.

reviews.title: All excellent
reviews.text: Excellent! Super serious with the schedules, friendly, answered all our questions, open to give the necessary information and more! Widely recommended, we would repeat the experience once and a thousand times!!!

reviews.title: Historica Lima Downtown
reviews.text: The best guided walking tour of downtown Lima,Peru You will see and explore all Downtown Lima has to offer with great scenery..

reviews.title: Beautiful walk through the historic center of Lima
reviews.text: Excellent tour! Our guide Martín was extremely kind and showed a lot of knowledge about the places visited. The driver José was also very attentive and the advice provided by Nico via what’s app was perfect! I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Great tour of Lima!
reviews.text: This tour was absolutely amazing! This is in large part due to Nico the tour guide. I had a million questions and Nico was very knowledgable and friendly throughout the tour. We started the tour in a nice, clean and air conditioned vehicle that was driven by an excellent driver; Oscar. We started the tour to the temple of Pachamac were we saw Alpacas (not always guaranteed!) and were able to learn a lot about Peru's pre-colonial history and culture. Nico cares a lot about his profession and is extremely knowledgeable of all the sites we visited. Then, we stopped at a nice spot in Barranco for a meal. Nico gave us excellent reccomendations and we loved our meals. We also saw a lot of Barranco's culture through historic landmarks and art; something we passed by all the time and had no idea of the importance until our knowledgeable guide explained this to us. Afterwards, we went to the old city center to visit the catacombs and were able to get a very nice tour of the catacombs which were rich with history. Finally, finishing off the tour we got to see the water-circuit tour in Miraflores. This was well worth the money and with Nico as your guide youre in the best hands. This tour and in particular in Nico made our trip to Peru that much better. Would highly recommend 11/10!

reviews.title: Guide was really good
reviews.text: It ended up only be two of us - benefits of a private tour having the guide all to ourselves.  Would definitely book and recommend this tour.  Thanks Geiner.

reviews.title: Fun and Informative Tour of Lima
reviews.text: Great company and tour of the city. The guide was very knowledgeable and would highly recommend. In fact I did recommend to some other tourists while visiting Cusco.

reviews.title: Great guided walk learning about past & present Lima
reviews.text: This tour was a wonderful experience with Nicolas. I learned so much on my first day in Lima because of all of his knowledge on history & architecture. It was a great walk through some beautiful character filled streets in downtown as well as some stops to along the way to downtown.

reviews.title: Highly recommended city tour
reviews.text: Nicolás was an amazing tour guide and exceeded all our expectations. He offers tours in Spanish and English. He was very friendly, accommodating, and knowledgeable in not only the specific areas we visited but also the broader history of Peru. We felt extremely safe throughout the tour and logistically everything went smoothly. He shared lots of tips and plenty of recommendations (local cuisine, restaurants, and bars) for us to enjoy the rest of our trip in Lima. Thank you, Nicolás for sharing a piece of your culture with us!
